title: Did not receive capsule for level up
body: Didnt receive capsule for lvling up from 41 and from 42.... Sent a ticket to riot and the only answer I had was to refresh the client ...lol

replies.body: Still don't have my capsule for level 40 and it's been 3 days since I leveled up
I didn't get mine at 34 yesterday. I still don't have it.
Double check your loot as some of these capsules have been delayed a bit. Still trying to figure out exactly what could have gone wrong with these levelup rewards.
I didn't get mine for 40, which should be easy to detect due to emotes. Still hasn't appeared a few days later.
